org.edg.data.replication.optorsim

Class GridConfFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.GridConfFileReader

  • public class GridConfFileReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a method to read the grid configuration file and build a route map, for the site to site connections. Other methods are provided to return the reconstructed information.

    Copyright (c) 2002 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

    Since:
    JDK1.4

        public void createGridSites()

      • buildNeighbours

        public java.util.Map buildNeighbours()
        Look in connectivity matrix and produce a Map of neighbours. This map takes a GridSite as the key and returns a further Map. This second Map contains all the neighbouring sites and their associated costs.
        Returns:
        A map describing network costs between sites
